scripts.build: vite build && cp public/build/.vite/manifest.json public/build/manifest.json || (echo 'WARNING: Manifest copy failed' && exit 1)
scripts.postbuild: test -f public/build/.vite/manifest.json && cp public/build/.vite/manifest.json public/build/manifest.json || echo 'Manifest not found in .vite, checking root...'
